name: The Silver Tray
description:
The Silver Tray is an interactive narrative about a man who's visited every night by a specter. It's the product of a collaboration between Anca Baciu, Shea Stevenson, Jake Clover and Cullen Page.

You can download it for free, or if you pay $2.00 you'll have access to a special package of images and audio from the game.
